articles.content: Early treatment with anti-VEGF injections slowed diabetic retinopathy in a clinical study from the DRCR Retina Network (DRCR.net). However, two years into the four-year study its effect on vision was… [+3502 chars]

articles.title: Mutations could render Covid vax ineffective in a year: Experts - ETHealthworld.com
articles.description: The results published on Tuesday deliver a stark warning of the risk the world is taking by failing to ensure all countries have sufficient vaccines to protect people from Covid-19.
articles.content: New York: Mutations could render current Covid-19 vaccines ineffective in a year or less, according to two-thirds of 77 epidemiologists, virologists and infectious disease specialists from 28 countri… [+3518 chars]

articles.title: Scientists find why cold induces toothache, hypersensitivity and how to stop it - ETHealthworld.com
articles.description: Researchers report in Science Advances that they have uncovered a new function for odontoblasts, the cells that form dentin, the shell beneath the tooth's enamel that encases the soft dental pulp containing nerves and blood vessels.
articles.content: Washington: Scientists during a recent study found that Odontoblasts, the cells that form a tooth's dentin function to sense cold, which can trigger a toothache. They also found a way to block the pa… [+4308 chars]
